organization.$: Department of Electronic and Electrical Engineering

head.citation-title: Quaternion-valued robust adaptive beamformer for electromagnetic vector-sensor arrays with worst-case constraint
head.abstracts: A robust adaptive beamforming scheme based on two-component electromagnetic (EM) vector-sensor arrays is proposed by extending the well-known worst-case constraint into the quaternion domain. After defining the uncertainty set of the desired signal.

organization.$: Department of Electronic and Electrical Engineering
